table.name: vtiger_roomsusers
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_roomsusers` ( `roomsusersid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `room_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `room_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `archived` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', `favorite` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_roomsuserscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_roomsuserscf` ( `roomsusersid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`roomsusersid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_roomsusers_user_field
